Product.Name: High-Waist Belted Zig Zag Tweed Pencil Skirt
Product.Description:
A timeless tweed, shaped for a slim fit with a high waist and a curve-skimming stretch fabric. Wear it with the Zig Zag Tweed jacket and a Ruffle-Front top for a look that's both professional and powerfully feminine.
  • 64% Polyester/31% Viscose/5% Spandex
  • Sits 1/2" above natural waist, detachable skinny belt
  • Hidden back zip, back vent
  • Hits below the knee
  • Fully lined
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: High-Waist Belted Paris Stripe Pencil Skirt
Product.Description:
Shaped for a slim fit with a high waist and a curve-skimming stretch fabric. The pinstripe pattern adds even more figure flattery. Pair it with a Cashmere Blend Cardigan or Essential button-down for a look that's both classic and current.
  • 64% Polyester/31% Viscose/5% Spandex
  • Sits 1/2" above natural waist, detachable skinny belt

  • Hits below the knee
  • Fully lined
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Ultimate Double Weave High Waist Pencil Skirt
Product.Description:
Our most flawless fabric in a high-waisted silhouette. Structured style with unstoppable attitude. Pair with our Ultimate Double Weave Hourglass Jacket for the must-have look in suits.

  • Clean seamed details
  • Back zip, lined
  • Hits above the knee
  • 49% Polyester/47% Cotton/4% Spandex
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Crinkle Gauze Maxi Skirt
Product.Description:
A vintage-inspired silhouette in a delectably soft crinkled fabric. The smocked waist and beautifully draped shape add elegance to your casual collection.
  • Smocked elastic waist
  • Maxi length
  • Crinkled gauze overlay
  • Lined
  • 100% Polyester
  • Hand wash
  • Imported

Product.Name: Leopard Maxi Skirt
Product.Description:
A feminine silhouette meets a pattern to bring out your inner fierceness. Keep it flowing with a jewel-toned tunic, or mix up proportions with a form-fitting cami.
  • 100% Polyester
  • Sits at waist
  • Solid elastic waistband
  • Fully lined
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: High Waisted Belted Pencil Skirt
Product.Description:
A curve-skimming pencil skirt flatters your figure. This style hits below the knee and comes with the belt for a sleek, urban look.

  • Back zip, back slit

Product.Name: Chiffon Maxi Skirt
Product.Description:
The modern maxi, in a gauzy fabric that moves with you. Flows from a wide waistband with light elasticity. Dress it up with sequins and heels, or keep it comfortable with a knit top and flats.
  • 100% Polyester
  • Slip-on Styling
  • Elastic waistband
  • Fully lined
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Description:

  • 64% Polyester, 31% Viscose, 5% Spandex
